DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective review of women who came through the ER at SMH with a pelvic inflammatory disease (PID) or tubo-ovarian abscess (TOA) between 1995-2005. They were looking at people with this diagnosis to determine how they were treated, whether as inpatient or outpatient and whether they were treated with drugs and how were these given and also did they develop an abscess.
DOC.brief_title: Rate of Pelvic Inflammatory Disease at St. Michael's Hospital
DOC.criteria: women admitted to Emergency with pelvicinflammatory disease or tuboovarian abscess from the year range: 19952000
